text: Family Research Council is an American conservative Christian group that started in 1981 and established in 1983 by James Dobson. In the late 1980s, the Family Research Council became part of Dobson's organization Focus on the Family. Although in 1992 the Family Research Council became a separate group again. They strongly oppose abortion, homosexuality and LGBT rights. ==References== Category:Christian organizations based in the United States Category:1983 establishments in the United States Category:Non-profit organizations of Washington, D.C.
title: Family Research Council
